curator.name: Curator
curator.dialogue.Mon: How are you today, lad? I hope things are going well in town.^How are you today, lass? I hope things are going well in town.
curator.dialogue.Tue: What grand timing! I'd just brewed a pot of tea. Fancy a cuppa? [614]$3
curator.dialogue.Wed: And how's my old friend Willy! Next time you see him, tell him Old Henry says Hello!
curator.dialogue.Thu: Hello lad!^Hello lass#$b#I'm chuffed to bits that you're helping me with my project.$1
curator.dialogue.Fri: %The Curator is reading a newspaper.#$b#Ah, good day young chap.^Good day young lass.#$b#Just catching up on the latest news. Did you know there's been sightings of mermaids off the Cerulean coast?$3
curator.dialogue.Sat: In my younger days, I used to be quite the angler you know.$3#$b#Oh, I caught some whoppers!#$b#Told a few too, when it comes to that!$1
curator.dialogue.Sun: Don't forget to say 'Hello' to sweet Goldie. She loves attention.#$b#Did you know goldfish can live up to 43 years, and have very good memories?$1
curator.dialogue.genderNeutral.Mon: How are you today @? I hope things are going well in town.
curator.dialogue.genderNeutral.Thu: Hello @!#$b#I'm chuffed to bits that you're helping me with my project.$1
curator.dialogue.genderNeutral.Fri: %The Curator is reading a newspaper.#$b#Ah, good day young @.#$b#Just catching up on the latest news. Did you know there's been sightings of mermaids off the Cerulean coast?$3
goldie.name: Goldie
goldie.dialogue.Mon: ...$0#$b#*Goldie studies you intently, as though she's trying to remember your face.*$1
goldie.dialogue.Wed: ...$2#$b#*Goldie swims around in circles. She looks restless.*$1
goldie.dialogue.Thu: ...$0#$b#*Goldie swims up to the glass and blows you a kiss.*$4
abigail.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Pufferf: Have you seen the 'Pufferfish' at the Aquarium?$0#$b#I love that thing!$1
penny.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Sandfish: I took Jas and Vincent on a trip to the Aquarium recently.$0#$b#It was a great educational trip for the children. But I especially liked the 'Sandfish'. It was so cute!$1
sebastian.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Frog: Have you been to the Aquarium lately?$0#$b#I saw they have terrarium with a 'Frog', it looked lonely so I donated one of my pet frogs...$7#$b#So it could have a friend.$1
willy.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Legend: Wow that 'Legend' is really something aye?$0#$b#I saw it at the Aquarium the other day!$1
willy.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Crimsonfi: Have you seen the 'Crimsonfish' at the Aquarium?$0#$b#The Curator at the Aquarium told me it was caught at the pier next to my shop!$1
willy.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Angler: I saw the 'Angler' at the Aquarium, I'm told it was caught here in Pelican Town!$0
willy.dialogue.AquariumDonated:MutantCar: That 'Mutant Carp' at the Aquarium is a real monster, have you seen it?$0
willy.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Glacierfi: Have you been to the Aquarium lately?$0#$b#I saw they have the 'Glacierfish' on display now, what a beauty!$1
willy.dialogue.AquariumDonated:Pufferchi: I snug down to the basement of the Aquarium, to take a peek at the 'Pufferchick'.$0#$b#It sure is a strange creature.$0
willy.dialogue.AquariumCompletedCT: Can you believe the Aquarium is all done?$0#$b#What a thing!$1
wizard.dialogue.AquariumDonated:SuperCuc: I saw that the Aquarium have a 'Super Cucumber' on display now.$0#$b#I believe it to be a peculiar type of the regular 'Sea Cucumber', it might possess arcane properties...$0#$b#%The Wizard seems lost in thought.
spring-npc.dialogue.1: Tourist: What should I buy from the giftshop?
spring-npc.dialogue.2: Tourist: Hi there, first time visiting the Aquarium?
spring-npc.dialogue.3: The woman doesn't notice you, she is busy.
spring-npc.dialogue.4: The man with glasses gives you a smug smile.
spring-npc.dialogue.5: Tourist: I can see some fish in the water!
spring-npc.dialogue.6: Tourist: My friend told me she saw a dolphin last time she was here.
spring-npc.dialogue.7: Tourist: I come here every spring and summer, I love this beach.
spring-npc.dialogue.8: Tourist: If you want to go for a swim, try the south part of the beach.
spring-npc.dialogue.9: Tourist: I'm just waiting on my friends.
spring-npc.dialogue.10: Tourist: Hello, come to enjoy the beach?
spring-npc.dialogue.11: Tourist: Look at all this food!
spring-npc.dialogue.12: Tourist: I come here for the music.
spring-npc.dialogue.13: Tourist: Sorry I don't know you.
spring-npc.dialogue.15: Tourist: Oh hi, I was just looking at this tidal pool.
spring-npc.dialogue.16: Tourist: This food is really good.
spring-npc.dialogue.18: Tourist: Have you tried this? It's not bad.
spring-npc.dialogue.19: Tourist: Hi, come grab a bite?
spring-npc.dialogue.20: Tourist: What should I try first?
spring-npc.dialogue.21: Tourist: Look at all those people over there stuffing themselves.
spring-npc.dialogue.22: Tourist: I'm trying to muster up the courage to go in the water.
spring-npc.dialogue.23: Tourist: The water is nice today, you should try it.
spring-npc.dialogue.24: Tourist: Hi, going for a swim?
spring-npc.dialogue.25: Tourist: I want to go swimming, but it will ruin my hair.
spring-npc.dialogue.26: Tourist: I love the beach in spring, not too hot not too cold.
spring-npc.dialogue.27: Tourist: I should try sunbathing, I could get a nice tan.
spring-npc.dialogue.28: Tourist: Hmm? Oh I was lost in thought.
spring-npc.dialogue.29: Tourist: Want to go for a swim? Use the area on the other side of the coloured line.
spring-npc.dialogue.30: Tourist: Hello, having a good day?
spring-npc.dialogue.31: Tourist: I like the aquarium, but this beach is also nice.
spring-npc.dialogue.32: Tourist: Hi, nice weather today. Don't you think?
summer-npc.dialogue.1: The man with glasses gives you a smug smile.
summer-npc.dialogue.2: Tourist: Should I buy a new bikini top?
summer-npc.dialogue.3: Tourist: Oh no! I forgot to bring my wallet.
summer-npc.dialogue.4: Tourist: What a cute fish bowl.
summer-npc.dialogue.5: Tourist: I wonder what fish the Aquarium has on display.
summer-npc.dialogue.6: Tourist: Hi there, first time visiting the Aquarium?
summer-npc.dialogue.7: Tourist: Did you know you can buy ice cream down at the beach?
summer-npc.dialogue.8: Lady: Do you want to go look at the fish in the Aquarium, Simon?
summer-npc.dialogue.9: Simon is too busy licking his lollipop to notice you.
summer-npc.dialogue.10: Tourist: I come here every spring and summer, I love this beach.
summer-npc.dialogue.11: Tourist: The view from the pier is really pretty this time of year.
summer-npc.dialogue.12: Tourist: I could have sworn I saw a chicken in the water, maybe it was just a pufferfish.
summer-npc.dialogue.14: Tourist: Oh hello sweetie. How are you today?
summer-npc.dialogue.15: Tourist: I could really go for some ice cream.
summer-npc.dialogue.16: Tourist: That woman on the pier looks puzzled.
summer-npc.dialogue.17: Clown: Want to see a balloon trick?
summer-npc.dialogue.18: Tourist: What is a clown doing on a beach?
summer-npc.dialogue.19: Tourist: Hi, I'm just waiting on my friends.
summer-npc.dialogue.20: Tourist: I like watching the sunset from here.
summer-npc.dialogue.21: Tourist: The ocean looks beautiful today.
summer-npc.dialogue.22: Man: Phew! It's so hot today.
summer-npc.dialogue.23: Tourist: I love the colours of the water in summer.
summer-npc.dialogue.24: Tourist: Remember to wear sun lotion, if you go sunbathing.
summer-npc.dialogue.25: Tourist: Want to go for a swim? Use the area on the other side of the coloured line.
summer-npc.dialogue.26: Tourist: Going for a swim is a great way to cool off.
summer-npc.dialogue.27: Tourist: I should have brought my swimming mask.
summer-npc.dialogue.28: Tourist: I'm not going swimming, it will ruin my hair.
summer-npc.dialogue.29: Tourist: You should try jumping in the water if you're feeling too hot.
summer-npc.dialogue.30: Tourist: Hi, going for a swim?
summer-npc.dialogue.31: Tourist: I'm trying to muster up the courage to go in the water.
summer-npc.dialogue.32: Tourist: I wonder if there are any sea shells on this beach.
summer-npc.dialogue.33: The man is snoozing, you probably shouldn't disturb him.
summer-npc.dialogue.34: Tourist: I think I saw a crab.
summer-npc.dialogue.36: Tourist: There are a lot of sea stars in these tidal pools.
summer-npc.dialogue.38: Tourist: Oh you like my hair? Thank you!
summer-npc.dialogue.39: Tourist: There's so much life in these tidal pools.
summer-npc.dialogue.42: Man: You can take a lot of pretty pictures at the beach.
summer-npc.dialogue.43: Tourist: That man over there just took my picture.
summer-npc.dialogue.44: The woman is too busy eating to notice you.
summer-npc.dialogue.48: Tourist: I hope there isn't citrus in any of this. I'm alergic you see.
summer-npc.dialogue.49: Tourist: Is that coleslaw? I love coleslaw.
summer-npc.dialogue.51: Tourist: I wonder what's in these tapas, they are yummy!
summer-npc.dialogue.52: Tourist: What?! Someone ate the food on my plate. Oh wait, it was me.
summer-npc.dialogue.53: Tourist: There is so much food!
summer-npc.dialogue.54: Tourist: Look we got Shrimp Cocktail, how fancy.
summer-npc.dialogue.55: Tourist: Hey, do we know each other?
summer-npc.dialogue.56: Tourist: They sell snacks here, they are really cheap.
fall-npc.dialogue.2: The man with glasses gives you a smug smile
fall-npc.dialogue.3: Tourist:Where is everyone? I guess fall isn't a very popular beach season.
fall-npc.dialogue.4: Tourist:The water is too cold this time of year to go swimming if ask me.
fall-npc.dialogue.5: Tourist:The water is a little cold, but I don't mind.
fall-npc.dialogue.8: Tourist: Hi, how are you today?
fall-npc.dialogue.9: Tourist: I need to catch the last bit of sun before winter comes.
fall-npc.dialogue.10: Tourist: I wonder what's in these bottles.
fall-npc.dialogue.13: Tourist: Have you tried the meat?
winter-npc.dialogue.1: Fisherman: Ye' can catch some mighty fine 'Squid' here at night.
winter-npc.dialogue.2: The fisherman hums a nautical tune to himself
winter-npc.dialogue.3: Fisherman: Come to do some fishing are ye'?
winter-npc.dialogue.4: Fisherman: Hmm? Oh hello, tight lines n' all that.
winter-npc.dialogue.5: Lady: Put that snowball down Simon.
winter-npc.dialogue.6: Simon has a mischievous smile on his face.
mask-tourist.dialogue: Tourist: Do you like my mask? You can buy them at the giftshop just outside!
iridium-knight.dialogue: I have done all that can be done. There is nothing left. I need one last challenge!
squire.dialogue: I'm looking for a knight in purple armor. Have you seen them?
